sentences.en: Advances in research on remediation of organic contaminated soil and groundwater are reviewed with 24 references.

sentences.en: Currently there are three kinds of remediation technologies including physical, chemical and bioremediation.
sentences.cn: 目前底泥修复主要有物理修复 、 化学修复和生物修复三大类技术.

sentences.en: Electrokinetic remediation is an environment - friendly and highly efficient in - situ technique.

sentences.en: If you do find an infected machine, the jury is out about how best to do remediation.

sentences.en: In order to protect the ecosystem function, the author put forward effective remediation measures.

sentences.en: Increased environmental pollution remediation, and sustainable development capacity continued to increase.

sentences.en: Remediation technologies for contaminated sites at the present in the world is summarized.
sentences.cn: 摘要本文旨在归纳总结目前国内外对污染场地的修复的各种技术.

sentences.en: The remediation of ozone depletion by chemical and physical method is reviewed.
